author: Slidebean
description:
Google targets Lighthouse, a subscription based phishing platform.

Google has filed suit against 25 individuals accused of operating Lighthouse, a service that provided paid access to phishing tools, spam systems, and hundreds of thousands of fraudulent website templates.

The case underscores a troubling trend: cybercrime shifting from individual bad actors to commercialized platforms offering fraud as a service.

In a world where even crime becomes SaaS, security has never been more critical.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: A “phishing subscription” exists and Google is shutting it down.
